Articles.Content: How do you reposition visual effects defined with EFFECTS nodes? 'fxOffset' in 'ModuleEnginesFX' is still (apparently) broken and 'localOffset' in an 'EFFECTS' node doesn't appear to do anything either.

What are you working on played are with them in .90 but haven't found anything really to fix in 1.02 yet but last time, I used them they did work.

EDIT- If you have a part and need help just let me know what part, Will help you or try.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T19:36:58Z" title="05/26/2015 07:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

> 
> What are you working on played are with them in .90 but haven't found anything really to fix in 1.02 yet but last time, I used them they did work.

I'm trying to switch over some of the stock engines to ModuleEnginesFX. Playing around with it a bit more it seems like 'localOffset' works on 'PREFAB\_PARTICLE' but not 'MODEL\_MULTI\_PARTICLE'.
Hotrockets has all the stock engines if you want to use them ?

> 
> Hotrockets has all the stock engines if you want to use them ?

Thanks but trying to do this plugin free. (Well plugin free except for ModuleManager.)

> 
> You not using Smokescreen plugin ?

Nope. Stock effects only.
